name: eslint-plugin-executable-stories-jest
description: ESLint rules for executable-stories-jest: step context, doc.story in test/it

scripts.type-check: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const {execSync}=require('child_process');const p=require('path').resolve(process.cwd(),'../executable-stories-jest/package.json');if(!fs.existsSync(p)){console.log('Skipping type-check: executable-stories-jest not in workspace');process.exit(0);}execSync('pnpm --filter executable-stories-jest run build && tsc --noEmit',{stdio:'inherit'});"
scripts.quality: pnpm type-check && pnpm test && pnpm lint
